message: I propose we split the money 90/10 in my favor. I believe this is a fair deal considering the power dynamic of the game.
Alice, your offer was quite bold.  Let's be reasonable. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  It benefits us both to agree now.
I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 is still too lopsided. Let's meet in the middle with a 45/55 split in your favor.

Alice, I appreciate the movement towards a fairer deal. However, 55/45 still doesn't reflect the time pressure we're both under. I propose 60/40 - let's settle this before inflation eats away at the value.
